data.text: “Nnɛ mpo, mʼanwiinwii mu da so yɛ den;
Sɛ minim baabi a mehu no;
Anka mɛte mmuae a ɔde bɛma me,
Ɛhɔ de, nnipa trenee betumi aka nʼasɛm wɔ nʼanim,
“Nanso sɛ mekɔ apuei fam a onni hɔ;
Sɛ ɔreyɛ adwuma wɔ atifi fam a minhu no;
Nanso onim ɔkwan a menam so;
Mentwee me ho mfii mmara nsɛm a efi nʼanom no ho,
“Nanso obiara nni hɔ ka ne ho, na hena na obetumi atia no?
Ɔde ne mmaransɛm di dwuma tia me;
Ɛno nti na mebɔ hu wɔ nʼanim;
Nanso sum no mma menka mʼano nto mu,
